channel.title: Duel Arena
channel.description: Is there anyway to get in the Duel Arena in a Private server? I wanted to make a training place inside but you can't teleport inside it and ::noclip bans me every time i use it. Its on my own server.

item.title: Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

Lmao so change the ban command.

Search for the noclip command in your client class. In the noclip command, you should see:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights >= 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; } take that out. Compile, then runserver and login. You can now noclip and not get banned! (That also includes people who get on your server though.

Read full topic
